content: PM 20-CG 12V Plumb and cross line laser Green beam combi-laser with 2 lines and 4 points for plumbing, leveling, aligning and squaring (12V battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Laser layout tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features High-speed layout – compact, self-leveling cross line laser with magnetic bracket so you can get started with minimal setup time Up to 5 days of continuous layout work per charge – powered by the same longer-lasting batteries as your other Hilti 12V tools Ultimate versatility – laser cross, four dots and slope mode make this line laser level suitable for virtually all alignment and layout work, even on inclines Better visibility up to 20 m – equipped with green beam for easier use indoors and in bright light Built for jobsite conditions – IP 54 rated protection against dust and moisture, and Class 2 laser which requires no special precautionary measures Applications Aligning pipes, cable trays, lighting and drywall track Leveling power outlets, cable trays, radiators and pipe installations Aligning and leveling doors, windows and handrails Transferring track positions and fastening points from floors to ceilings (laser plumb bob) Transferring reference heights ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accuracy: ±0.12 in at 33 ft Max. operating distance (diameter): 131 ft (lines), 328 ft (lines, with receiver) Maximum operating time: 33 h Technical Data | Accuracy | ±0.12 in at 33 ft | Max. operating distance (diameter) | 131 ft (lines), 328 ft (lines, with receiver) | 1 | Maximum operating time | 33 h | Battery type | 12 V | Self leveling range at room temperature | +/-4 ° | Self leveling time | 3 s | Horizontal fan angle | 200 ° | Vertical fan angle | 160 ° | IP protection class | IP 54 (EN 60529) | Laser type | Line and point | Operating distance can be significantly affected by site conditions. See operating instructions. ### ITEMS- 3767566 - PM 20-CG A12 + Receiver - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PM 20-CG A12 Combilaser - 1x PMA 89 Magnetic bracket - 1x PMA 64 Soft Pouch - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 1x PMA 32 Receiver - 2x AA (2) Battery alkaline - 1x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 3767567 - PM 20-CG A12 + PMA 20 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PM 20-CG A12 Combilaser - 1x PMA 89 Magnetic bracket - 1x PMA 64 Soft Pouch - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 1x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x PMA 20 Tripod small - 3767565 - PM 20-CG A12 Basic Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PM 20-CG A12 Combilaser - 1x PMA 89 Magnetic bracket - 1x PMA 64 Soft Pouch - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 1x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 2322752 - PM 20-CG A12 Plumb and Cross line laser - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PM 20-CG A12 Combilaser - 1x PMA 89 Magnetic bracket - 1x PMA 64 Soft Pouch
